reviewText: Decent price, could have been a little lower. Quality dvd. Packaging was good .
One of the best Italian masterpiece movies of all times
I accept responsibility for not having sufficiently researched this item before purchase.  I did not realize that the subtitles would be in Korean. This is not what I thought I was ordering.
Same complaint. KOREAN SUBTITLES. NO COMPRENDE AMIGO. I WANT MY $$ BACK.

The DVD arrived as promised in a reasonable amount of time and in good condition. What I did not expect, is that the subtitles would be in KOREAN and not English! That fact was NOT in the description. It is my favorite movie so I wanted this for a long time. I do speak some Italian but not enough to decipher everything without the English subtitles. I will continue to look for a copy with the English subtitles. Wish the description was more informative.
